Name: Sternberg Working Memory
ReferencesAndLinks: Onton, J., Delorme, A., and Makeig, S. (2005). Frontal midline EEG dynamics during working memory. Neuroimage 27, 241-356. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.neuroimage.2005.04.014.
